ygData.subject: Re: EQ slang
ygData.msgSnippet: I think it s pretty tough to exploit with bards, although maybe you can prove me wrong. Casters usually seem to be the most gifted when it comes to exploiting.
ygData.messageBody:
I think it's pretty tough to exploit with
bards, although maybe you can prove me wrong.

Casters usually seem to be the most gifted
when it comes to exploiting.

> Death before purple,
>
> Cooter
